title: Corsairs: Straik
description: What’s worse than finding a lost ship full of stolen humans? It’s finding out that your family is responsible. This is a wrong I have to somehow right, so I take off to find answers…and discover one of those kidnapped humans has stowed away on my ship.She’s furious that I’ve deserted her friends. She’s determined to make me pay. Ruth swears vengeance and won’t be satisfied until she sees me destroyed.It’s a battle of wills I’m determined to win.Instead of breaking Ruth, I find that I’ll do just about anything to get her to kiss me again.Now…who’s bending who?
author: Ruby Dixon
